title: RICHARD記者提水，全部人同我睇。

replies.msg:
IMPORTANT INFO FROM SOURCE:

Look out for this 12 seater van, registration MR866
Driver’s name: Dom 洪錦超
Phone number: 9651 1622
He will start picking up the gangs at 7:30am in Yuen Long then drive them to Shatin.

8:00am Assemble at Shatin City Plaza
-
North Point Pickup -7:15am
-
Van 1 - Phone number 9770 2167
Reg: LP6836
Can 2 - 9049 3028, 6592 9983
-
WARNING:
Tomorrow’s clean up action, the surprise appeal for the Tuen Mun protests and the attempts to create an aggressive airport protest this weekend are all a kind of inverse honey trap.
The gangs are allowed to assemble by the police, instigate violence then the police will come and arrest as many protesters as they can. Their aim is to deplete the frontline of numbers for Oct 1st.
-
Protesters, please exercise extreme caution this weekend when mobilising.
THINK: is it absolutely necessary.
FOCUS: Should be on October 1st, and not being moths around the lamp of Junius Ho.
唔該同我係咁推，一定要俾人知

唔識英文嘅，睇呢段，聽日嘅清潔大行動，系會突擊屯門，製造暴力事件。都是警察就可以有藉口拘捕所有人，當然何bb d 人就冇事。

對家個首要目的，係希望將我哋勇武嘅手足係國慶之前除去。和里非？sorry，如果你喺局內，你都係死。
